info.name: circular puzzle interactive (430
info.description:
interactive variant of [url] https://shadertoy.com/view/3dlGzX [/url] (see reference img and video below).

Use mouse to turn manually the 8 rings

renderpass.code:
// interactive variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/3dlGzX

#define mainImage(O,u)                                       \
    I(u);                                                    \
    O = ( c > 0. && c < 9.                                   \
            ? U.y = .9*U.y - T(c).y,                         \
              U = abs(fract( U * mat2(1,1,-1,1)*.707 ) - .5),\
              1. + .6* min(0.,cos(38.*max(U.x,U.y)))         \
             + ( k==0.? .1* cos(9.*c-5.*iTime) : 0. ) \
            : .4                                             \
        ) * vec4(1,.9,.7,1)
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
// O.x = cur ring id    T[i,*].y = angle of ring #i
// O.z = isTurning      O.a = handle offset

#define mainImage(O,u)                                  \
    O = T(u);                                           \
    I(iMouse.xy); /* k = iMouse.z; */                   \
    O.z<=0. && k>0. ? O.x = c, O.a = U.y-O.y : (c = O.x); \
    u.x-.5==c ? O.y = U.y-O.a : c;                      \
    O.z = k
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define T(U) texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(U), 0)                //
                                                               //
#define I(u) vec2 R = iResolution.xy,                           \
                  U = 2.*u - R;                                 \
                  U = vec2( 2.5*length(U/=R.y), atan(U.y,U.x) );\
                  float c = ceil(4.28*(U.x-.48)),               \
                        k = iMouse.z
renderpass.name: Common
